summary: Feature request to add buffered metrics support to the Ruby SDK, similar to the Python SDK implementation, allowing users to provide a metric buffer to the runtime as an alternative to OTel and Prometheus.
userImpact: Users of the Ruby SDK are unable to use buffered metrics as an alternative to OTel and Prometheus for metric collection.
proposedFix: Implement buffered metrics feature in Ruby SDK similar to Python SDK implementation, with specialized Rust-side work required.
resolutionDetails: Issue closed due to active development. The team indicated it would be difficult to contribute at the early stage until stable release, and specialized Rust work is required.
keyQuote: Since it is under so much active development right now, it would be a bit difficult to contribute. We have a large PR coming within the next few weeks for full workflow support that changes so much it may not be worth contributing at least until then.
